Package org.apache.hupa.server.handler

Class Summary
AbstractDeleteMessageHandler<Action extends DeleteMessage> Abstract class which should get extended by all handlers which needs to handle message deletion
AbstractFetchMessagesHandler<A extends FetchMessages>  
AbstractSendMessageHandler<A extends SendMessage> Handle sending of email messages
AbstractSendMessageHandler.FileItemDataStore DataStore which wrap a FileItem
AbstractSessionHandler<A extends Action<R>,R extends Result> Abstract class which take care of checking if the session is still valid before executing the handler
CheckSessionHandler Handler for asking the server if the session is valid
ContactsHandler Handler for getting the list of contacts
CreateFolderHandler Handle creation of folders
DeleteAllMessagesHandler  
DeleteFolderHandler Handle delete requests for a folder
DeleteMessageByUidHandler Handler which take care of deleting messages
FetchFoldersHandler Handler which fetch all Folders for an user
FetchMessagesHandler Fetch Messages for a user.
FetchRecentMessagesHandler  
ForwardMessageHandler Handler which handles the forwarding of a message
GetMessageDetailsHandler  
GetRawMessageHandler  
IdleHandler Handle Noops
JavamailUtil Util class which helps to convert from hupa internal data representation to javamaill classes
LoginUserHandler Handler for login a user via username and password
LogoutUserHandler Handler for handle logout requests
MoveMessageHandler Handler which handle moving of messages
PrepareNewMessageHandler Handle Noops
RenameFolderHandler Handler which handle renaming of folders
ReplyMessageHandler Handler which handle replies to a message
SendMessageHandler Handler which handle sending of new messages
SetFlagsHandler  
TagMessagesHandler Handler which use user flags for supporting tagging of messages
